abstract: Major stock indexes make modest gains, ending second-worst week for market so far in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Major indexes notched modest gains on Friday, but it wound up being the second-worst week for Wall Street so far this year.

headline.main: Modest Gain Helps the Market End a Four-Day Losing Streak
headline.print_headline: Market Struggles to Regain After Four Days of Losses

snippet: Major indexes notched modest gains on Friday, but it wound up being the second-worst week for Wall Street so far this year.
